en-US.summary: Find the synonyms, antonyms, rhymes, definitions, and more of any word!
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask word box for a synonym for happy.
Alexa, ask word box for a random antonym for excited.
Alexa, ask word box for all definitions of cool.
en-US.name: WordBox
en-US.description: Broaden your vocabulary with WordBox. Ask for a synonym, antonym, rhyme, definition, part of speech, frequency, or syllables of a word!

en-GB.description: Broaden your vocabulary with WordBox. Ask for a synonym, antonym, rhyme, definition, part of speech, frequency, or syllables of a word!

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
No specific hardware or software required; should work out of the box with the proper voice command. Examples:

a synonym for happy
a synonym for sad

a random synonym for happy
a random synonym for sad

all synonyms for happy
all synonyms for sad

an antonym for good
an antonym for sad

a random antonym for good
a random antonym for sad

all antonyms for good
all antonyms for sad

the part of speech for dog
the part of speech for happy

a rhyme for happy
a rhyme for dog

a random rhyme for happy
a random rhyme for dog

the definition of happy
the definition of king

define happy
define king

all definitions of happy
all definitions of king

the syllables for happy
the syllables for dinosaur

the syllables of happy
the syllables of dinosaur

the frequency of happy
the frequency of dog

how common happy is
how common dog is
